description: This file defines an API endpoint using FastAPI to retrieve cost summaries. It sets up a router, defines a GET endpoint that accepts a query parameter 'period', depends on user authentication and database session, and returns a CostSummary schema with cost data.

classes.name: CostSummary
classes.description: Pydantic model schema representing the summary of costs, including totals and breakdowns.

methods.name: CostSummary costs_summary_endpoint( period: str = Query("monthly", description="Aggregation period (daily|monthly)"), _user=Depends(get_current_user), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
methods.description: Async function that handles GET requests to '/costs/summary', returning cost summary data.

ctags.name: costs_summary_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( period: str = Query("monthly", description="Aggregation period (daily|monthly)"), _user=Depends(get_current_user), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
